page.title: 08OUR EXHIBITION
page.content: AS PART OF OUR WORK FOR THE DOOMSDAY PROJCT WE COLLECTED LOTS OF INFORMTION ABOUT OUR VILLAGE . WE ASKED PEOPLE FOR OLD PHOTOGRAPHS . WE COLLECTED{ SO MANY WE DECIDED TO SET UP AN EXHIBITION OF PHOTOGRAPHS AND ARTEFACTS. WE BORROWED LOTS OF FISHING GEAR FROM EYEMOUTH MUSEUM AND FROM LOCAL FISHERMEN . WE DREW AND PAINTED PICTURES, WE WROTE STORIES ALL ABOUT OUR VILLAGE IN THE PAST.AND WHAT IT LOOKS LIKE NOW. WITH A LOT OF HELP FROM OUR PARENTS WE WERE READY AND ON SUNDAY 26TH MAY 1985 WE OPENED OUR EXHIBITION. SOME OF US DRESSED AS FISHERFOLK TO SHOW THE VISITORS ROUND AND WE WERE SURPRISED TO FIND THAT PEOPLE HAD COME FROM EDINBURGH AND FROM ENGLAND .IN ALL WE HAD 289 VISITORS ON SUNDAY AND EVEN WHEN THE SCHOOL WAS IN SESSION ON MONDAY PEOPLE ASKED TO COME IN TO SEE OUR DISPLAY.
